TopicTitle: Post YOUR kerman name and quote here.

Articles.Content:
"Reach for the stars, just don't fly into them."

- Heebeeb Kerman

"Why do I always get the wobbly rockets?"

-Dildo Kerman

Johnathan J. O'Kermann

"That's O'Kermann, with two Ns"

Kestrel Kerman

"It's full of stars!"

Billy-Bobler Kerman

"I wonder what's this red button do?"

Vlad'Mir Kerman

"I suppose I am green cause all this nuclear radiation"

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited October 6, 2013 by TUFOM
at this point jack wolf's is the most liked.

Bill Kerman

Kouston, we appear to be missing our parachute. Is this going to be a problem?

Klein Kerman

Quote: Hay guys I'm getting kinda hungry, where we keep the snacks?......wait what's this note??

Edited October 6, 2013 by Tidus Klein

Keil Kerman

--"[hey guys... where's the ladder. OK then, no ladder] One big step for me, one giant leap for kerbalkind...[thud]

Name: Trevesten Kerman

Quote: ...Well Then...

*upon the sudden decompression and destruction of the Kerbal space station before his eyes while safe in a SSTO.*

Name: Melley Kerman

Quote: "I'm assuming Jeb set the stages correctly.." *hits stage* *fuel and landing legs fly away* "I never liked you, Jeb"

Name: Otis Kerman

Quote: "what happens when you hit the red button?"

Name: Kyakovlev Kerman

Quote: There's always space for an additional module on that space station...

Gredarki Kerman.

"Parachute? What parachute?"

Name: Ioannes Kerman

Quote: Better out that in!

Name: Harby Kerman

Quote: "Explosions just mean you have a lot of fuel. Use that fuel to reach to the stars... assuming you're still in one piece"

RIP Harby Kerman, one of the two kerbals for the first landing on another planet (Duna), landing on the Moon and testing crazy stuff that only Jeb would go near.

Name: Merby Kerman

Quote: "I told you that rock was dangerous Harby!"

Name: John F. Kerman

Quote: "I believe that this nation should commit itself to achieving the goal, before tomorrow is out, of landing a kerbal on the mun and maybe returning him to Kerbin."
Jebanon Kerman - "We prefer to call it a Rapid Unplanned Disassembly upon a High-speed Lithobraking manoeuvre, none of that Crashing talk..."

Name: Orwell Kerman

Quote: History is a tool we use to build the future. You aren't free if you let people blur the past. Guide yourself to the future you want to happen by using the past to your advantage.

Edited October 12, 2013 by Needles_10
I've just started a thread for everyone to show off their best modded space stations!(go here:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52584-Show-Your-Best-modded-Space-Station-Here%21%21)

Spiff Kerman

-"Our valiant hero; Space man Spiff Kerman on the surface of Ike, battling the strange alien menace; The Kraken!!!"

Jake Kerman

Quote: Lets hope these Jet engines and LV 909's get us from Laythe to kerbin

Bob Kerman: Rise at dawn to meet the Mun. Fall at dusk to greet your home.

-Duxwing
